discussion.title: How to output more than one equation for each complexity
discussion.body:
I am new to Symbolic Regression and have set up a small example. For the output, it will generate an equation for each complexity level. But if I want to see top 3 equation for each complexity level. How could I change the parameter under Options ?

Thank you

nodes.body: What do you need it for? This isn’t possible because it would end up displaying trivial perturbations of the expressions like `x + 1.5` and `1.5 + x`. So multiple expressions at each complexity aren’t recorded. The closest thing you could do is to use the tensor board feature which gives you the historical equations at each complexity’s
